abstract: Dozen opposition protesters are arrested in Moscow after clashes between supporters of Pres Vladimir V Putin and those of Russia's most prominent opposition leader Aleksei A Navalny.
lead_paragraph: Opposition protesters were arrested in Moscow on Thursday evening after scuffles broke out between supporters of President Vladimir V. Putin and Aleksei A. Navalny.
snippet: Opposition protesters were arrested in Moscow on Thursday evening after scuffles broke out between supporters of President Vladimir V. Putin and Aleksei A. Navalny.

headline.main: Russia: Opposition Protesters Are Arrested After Clash
headline.print_headline: Russia: Opposition Protesters Are Arrested After Clash
